none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 02, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
This relic is a total mindfukk. Bass, drums and electronics combine with chaotic, impassioned vocals to create a truly bizarre ruckus. A painful experience all around, but one offered up with a sincerity that trumps execution or pretense. I dare say that when I realized was recorded 22 years ago in Nebraska, I thought it made perfect sense. EARTH RAPIST
//4.bp.blogspot.com/-b_xCXXh9tMA/UpwF_wlYpYI/AAAAAAAAJHo/XHP0lcsW14s/s1600/armatron+cover+copy.jpg //3.bp.blogspot.com/-69RnCwVerGU/UpwIFlQCBjI/AAAAAAAAJH0/OiZBnPRfQvc/s1600/armatron+img+copy.jpg

seo.title: Armatron - Armatron demo 1991 - Terminal Escape
